questions.question_text: A developer has configured the Element property of a Click activity. Which property of the Click activity should be left blank?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Es la D

choices.B: All Attach Browser activities in the project
choices.A: Only Attach Browser activities with the default BrowserType property
choices.C: Navigate To and Close Tab activities
choices.D: Only Attach Browser activities with the BrowserType property set on IE

questions.question_text: A developer changed the Run value and Debug value of the Browser property to Chrome in the UI Automation section of the Activity Project Settings menu. Which activities will be affected by this change?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
ans. should be A

Selected Answer: A
The correct anwser ist A

questions.question_text:
A developer created a production level automation using the Robotic Enterprise (RE) Framework. The Config.xlsx file included in the framework contains values used within the automation project.
Which values can each sheet in the Config.xlsx file contain?

choices.D:
Settings sheet contains hard-coded values and names of Credential assets.
Assets sheet contains only hard-coded values.
choices.A:
Settings sheet contains only hard-coded values.
Assets sheet contains all names of Orchestrator assets.
choices.B:
Settings sheet contains only hard-coded values.
Assets sheet contains only hard-coded values.
choices.C:
Settings sheet can contain hard-coded values.
Assets sheet contains all names of Orchestrator assets except those of type Credential.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Es la C

Selected Answer: D
D is the right ans.

Selected Answer: D
D is the correct ans. '

Selected Answer: D
The correct anwser is D

choices.C: Transaction is retried multiple times until processed successfully
choices.A: Transaction is not retried and the process stops
choices.B: Transaction is not retried but remaining transactions continue processing
choices.D: Transaction is retried only one time

questions.question_text:
A process was developed in the Robotic Enterprise (RE) Framework using an Orchestrator queue. The Max # of retries for the queue is set to 1 and the queue has 30 new transaction items. At runtime, the first Transaction Item throws a System Exception.

How does the process proceed?

A developer created a project that contains a flowchart. The developer received a change request from the business as follows:

1. If the Invoice Number contains special characters, the robot must remove them and then continue the process.
2. If the Invoice Number contains only digits, do not change anything, keep the existing logic.

In order to add the new requirement, which activity should the developer use in the flowchart based on UiPath best practices?
